column8: 她的缥缈的身影叫人想起振翅欲飞的鸥鸟，白裙被猎猎海风扬起的时候，观者总能描绘出一副飞向乌托邦的飞鸟之图。\n不知道那端坐于桅杆横木之上的少女，是否也曾想象过自己的遨游之姿呢？
column9: Her ethereal beauty is always reminiscent of the bird of heaven, spreading its glossy wings towards utopia as her white dress fluttering in caressing breezes.\nHowever, does the girl herself who perches on the mast ever imagine herself flying upon the azure sky?

column8:
A.F.3@1年7月3日，应内森尼尔・福布斯・格林基金会的邀请，弥萨格大学参与了针对「幽灵船」索纳尼尔号的调查。
登上这艘于十年前被宣布沉没的三桅帆船后，出勤调查员芬戈尔・约翰森随即失去了通讯信号。
A.F.3@1年7月10日，学校再次与他取得联系时，约翰森调查员已身处300海里外的雷欧高地北岸。约翰森调查员称，登船后他马上就失去了时间与空间的概念，并且无论如何都无法想起在索纳尼尔号上发生的一切。
时至今日，约翰森调查员也只能依稀记起一个名词：永恒乐土。
基于幽灵船本身的无害性，弥萨格大学于今日（A.F.3@1年12月24日）决定中止调查。
――《档案：索纳尼尔号船难调查》
column9:
On July 3, A.F.3@1, being invited by the Nathaniel Forbes Green Foundation, Mythag University participated in the investigation towards the "ghost ship" Sona-Nyl.
Upon boarding the barque which had been declared sunk ten years ago, the communication signal from investigator Fingal Johansen had immediately out of reach.
On July 10, A.F.3@1, the university eventually managed to get him. Located at the northern shore of Leo Heights with 300 nautical miles away from the original destination, investigator Johansen declared that he lost sense of time and space at the second he stepped on Sona-Nyl, and could not recall anything that happened onboard.
Investigator Johansen can hitherto only vaguely remember a word: Elysian.
Due to the unharmful nature of the ghost ship itself, Mythag University decide to terminate the investigation today (A.F.3@1 year, December 24).
―"File: Investigation of the Sona-Nyl Crash."

column8:
希莱斯特加入学校的第一分钟，便被朵尔带走并接受了全面评估。
作为非大学流程召唤的唤醒体，希莱斯特的精神状态出奇稳定。但与之相对的，无论是精神体强度，还是作为银芯强度评判标准的诺斯指数，希莱斯特都远远没有达到唤醒体的标准。
然而，如同虚空中盛开的无形之花一般，她作为唤醒体降临在了世界上。
尽管在日常活动与外勤任务中均未表现出异常，但通过数据监控我们得知，希莱斯特的情况不容乐观：她身上微弱的意志正在不断流失。
目前，唤醒系正在筹备一个小规模教团，希望以供给信仰的方式维持希莱斯特的存在，有意加入且精通水性者请联系茜尔维亚老师。
column9:
Grabbed by Doll upon the moment of joining the university, Celeste has undergone a series of comprehensive assessment.
As an Awakener summoned from non-standard process, Celeste's mental state is incredibly stable. However, neither her spirit intensity nor her Gnostic index which evaluates the strength of slivercore meets the Awakener's standard.
Yet she still emerged into this world as an Awakener, like a flower with invisible petals brusts in abysmal nothingness.
Although no abnormalities has shown in daily activities or field missions, data record reveals Celeste's concerning situation: her will, already faint, continues to evansce.
By now, the Awakening Department is organizing a small order to sustain Celeste's existence by supplying religious belief. Those who are interested in joining and proficient in aquatic activities could contact Teacher Sylvia for further infomation.

column8:
跟随极乐鸟前行的第三十一天，索纳尼尔号驶进一片起雾的海域。
希莱斯特坐在桅杆的高处，眺望着下方的人们。那里传来鲁特琴甜美的旋律，与祈祷航行顺利的歌声。

她不知晓这次航行的目的地，也不清楚这趟旅程能够带来多少财富与名誉。她不在意祈祷者是否虔诚，亦不在意在海上悄然流传的，关于她不够灵验的恶名。既然她被要求了给予航船庇佑，那么她就将沉默地履行着使命。

当歌声停止，雾霭散去，出现在水手面前的却是一片怒涛汹涌的风暴之海。闪电撕开天幕，黑色污雨倾盆而下，激流将脆弱的船身卷起，投入那骇人的深渊之中。

「神已经抛弃我们了！」绝望的亲眷们呐喊着，咆哮着，将她关入暗无天地的地牢。
失职的庇佑者，已经无人深究她为何无法履行使命，而希莱斯特亦只余下最后一个微小的疑惑。

……那艘船为什么会沉呢？

曾将她束缚桅杆之上的铁链溅起水花，她向深海坠去……
如同被折断双翼的白鸟。
column9:
On the thirty-first day following the celestial bird, Sona-Nyl sails into a sea shrouded by streaming mist.
Celeste perches high on the mast, gazing upon her people below. Notes of the lutanist drift in sweet melodies. Songs praying for a smooth journey echo betwixt.

She does not aware of their destination, nor does she evaluate how much wealth and fame bestowing across the sea. She does not care whether the prayers are pious, nor does she unsettled by the rumors about her power, circulating surreptitiously around the sea. Being asked to bless the voyage, she does not need words to complete her duty.

And when the music ceases and the mist lifts, the sailors behold only a resistless raging sea. Lightning tears through the sky. Black rain pours down, bursting thunders of gigantic spray. Rushing torrent captures the fragile barque and throws it into the gaping abyss.

"God has forsaken us!" Kindreds scream in desperation. Bellows imprison her into the lightless dungeon.
Neglected and derelicted, the protector is left alone unquestioned with her failed duty, and one last lingering confusion.

Why... why did the barque sink?

The chain that once manacled her to the mast drown into the roaring splash. She plummets into the depth...
Like a white bird with snapped wings flaking from the sky.

column8:
我们的好朋友，神通广大的汉娜・皮斯利，不知从何处挖到了希莱斯特的研究资料。托这位行事大胆的记者的福，原本是保密级别的资料和她们之间那段短小的访谈，现在闹得人尽皆知了。

汉娜在阅读了保密资料后，向那位平时便缺乏情绪的希莱斯特，提出了一个问题。

「大多数唤醒体都有未竟之愿，这是他们与学校合作的基础之一。但是在这份资料中，你的愿望一栏是空白的。你没有想要完成的事吗？或者，你成为唤醒体的意义在哪呢？」

「有的，我有的。」

少女的表情没有露出破绽，和往常一样虚无，高洁。如果不是这声短促的、焦急的回答，记者小姐几乎要以为对方没有听见自己的问题。


「我会找到愿望的……大家是如此希望的，所以，我会找到的。」

温柔的声音，恍如一场一触即碎的梦幻。
column9:
Our good friend, the resourceful Hannah Peaslee, somehow dug up the research materials on Celeste. Thanks to this audacious reporter, both the originally confidential materials and her brief interview with Celeste has now spreaded into every corner.

After reading the confidential materials, Hannah posed a question to her usually emotionless face.

"Most Awakeners have unfulfilled wishes, which lie in their basic motivations for cooperating with the university. However, your wish section is blank in this material. Don't you have any desire to accomplish anything? Or what is your meaning as an Awakener?"

"I have, I do have."

The girl's expression showed no cracks, as ethereal and noble as usual. If it were not for that brief answer and the anxiety within, the reporter would have almost thought that she miss the question.


"I will find my wish... everyone wishes so. Therefore I will find it."

Her soft voice resounded, delicate and fragile like an easily shattered dream.
